<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Big Button</title>
    <style>
      .big-button {
        font-size: 2em;
        padding: 1em;
        background-color: #4CAF50;
        color: white;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 5px;
        cursor: pointer;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <button class="big-button">Click me!</button>
  </body>
</html>

make a simple flappy bird game

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<title>Flappy Bird Game</title>
	<style>
		canvas {
			border: 1px solid black;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas" width="400" height="500"></canvas>
	<script>
		// Get the canvas element and context
		var canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
		var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

		// Set up the bird object
		var bird = {
			x: 50,
			y: 250,
			width: 50,
			height: 50,
			speed: 5,
			gravity: 0.5,
			jump: 10,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "yellow";
				ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
			},
			update: function() {
				this.speed += this.gravity;
				this.y += this.speed;
			},
			flap: function() {
				this.speed = -this.jump;
			}
		};

		// Set up the pipes object
		var pipes = {
			top: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 0,
				width: 50,
				height: 200,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			bottom: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 300,
				width: 50,
				height: 200,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			draw: function() {
				this.top.draw();
				this.bottom.draw();
			},
			update: function() {
				this.top.update();
				this.bottom.update();
				if (this.top.x + this.top.width < 0) {
					this.top.x = canvas.width;
					this.bottom.x = canvas.width;
					this.top.height = Math.floor(Math.random() * 200) + 50;
					this.bottom.y = this.top.height + 100;
					this.bottom.height = canvas.height - this.bottom.y;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the score object
		var score = {
			value: 0,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "black";
				ctx.font = "30px Arial";
				ctx.fillText("Score: " + this.value, 10, 50);
			},
			update: function() {
				if (pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width < bird.x) {
					this.value++;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the game loop
		function loop() {
			ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
			bird.draw();
			bird.update();
			pipes.draw();
			pipes.update();
			score.draw();
			score.update();
			if (bird.y + bird.height > canvas.height || bird.y < 0) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			if (bird.x + bird.width > pipes.top.x && bird.x < pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width && bird.y < pipes.top.height || bird.x + bird.width > pipes.bottom.x && bird.x < pipes.bottom.x + pipes.bottom.width && bird.y + bird.height > pipes.bottom.y) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			requestAnimationFrame(loop);
		}

		// Set up the event listeners
		document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
			if (event.keyCode === 32) {
				bird.flap();
			}
		});

		// Start the game loop
		loop();
	</script>
</body>
</html>
make the pipe opening wider

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<title>Flappy Bird Game</title>
	<style>
		canvas {
			border: 1px solid black;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas" width="400" height="500"></canvas>
	<script>
		// Get the canvas element and context
		var canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
		var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

		// Set up the bird object
		var bird = {
			x: 50,
			y: 250,
			width: 50,
			height: 50,
			speed: 5,
			gravity: 0.5,
			jump: 10,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "yellow";
				ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
			},
			update: function() {
				this.speed += this.gravity;
				this.y += this.speed;
			},
			flap: function() {
				this.speed = -this.jump;
			}
		};

		// Set up the pipes object
		var pipes = {
			top: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 0,
				width: 50,
				height: 250,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			bottom: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 350,
				width: 50,
				height: 150,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			draw: function() {
				this.top.draw();
				this.bottom.draw();
			},
			update: function() {
				this.top.update();
				this.bottom.update();
				if (this.top.x + this.top.width < 0) {
					this.top.x = canvas.width;
					this.bottom.x = canvas.width;
					this.top.height = Math.floor(Math.random() * 200) + 50;
					this.bottom.y = this.top.height + 100;
					this.bottom.height = canvas.height - this.bottom.y;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the score object
		var score = {
			value: 0,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "black";
				ctx.font = "30px Arial";
				ctx.fillText("Score: " + this.value, 10, 50);
			},
			update: function() {
				if (pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width < bird.x) {
					this.value++;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the game loop
		function loop() {
			ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
			bird.draw();
			bird.update();
			pipes.draw();
			pipes.update();
			score.draw();
			score.update();
			if (bird.y + bird.height > canvas.height || bird.y < 0) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			if (bird.x + bird.width > pipes.top.x && bird.x < pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width && bird.y < pipes.top.height || bird.x + bird.width > pipes.bottom.x && bird.x < pipes.bottom.x + pipes.bottom.width && bird.y + bird.height > pipes.bottom.y) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			requestAnimationFrame(loop);
		}

		// Set up the event listeners
		document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
			if (event.keyCode === 32) {
				bird.flap();
			}
		});

		// Start the game loop
		loop();
	</script>
</body>
</html>
make the game take up the whole screen

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<title>Flappy Bird Game</title>
	<style>
		canvas {
			position: absolute;
			top: 0;
			left: 0;
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
			z-index: -1;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas"></canvas>
	<script>
		// Get the canvas element and context
		var canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
		var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

		// Set the canvas dimensions to match the window size
		canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
		canvas.height = window.innerHeight;

		// Set up the bird object
		var bird = {
			x: 50,
			y: canvas.height / 2,
			width: 50,
			height: 50,
			speed: 5,
			gravity: 0.5,
			jump: 10,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "yellow";
				ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
			},
			update: function() {
				this.speed += this.gravity;
				this.y += this.speed;
			},
			flap: function() {
				this.speed = -this.jump;
			}
		};

		// Set up the pipes object
		var pipes = {
			top: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 0,
				width: 50,
				height: canvas.height / 2 - 100,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			bottom: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: canvas.height / 2 + 100,
				width: 50,
				height: canvas.height / 2 - 100,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			draw: function() {
				this.top.draw();
				this.bottom.draw();
			},
			update: function() {
				this.top.update();
				this.bottom.update();
				if (this.top.x + this.top.width < 0) {
					this.top.x = canvas.width;
					this.bottom.x = canvas.width;
					this.top.height = Math.floor(Math.random() * (canvas.height / 2 - 200)) + 50;
					this.bottom.y = this.top.height + 200;
					this.bottom.height = canvas.height - this.bottom.y;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the score object
		var score = {
			value: 0,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "black";
				ctx.font = "30px Arial";
				ctx.fillText("Score: " + this.value, 10, 50);
			},
			update: function() {
				if (pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width < bird.x) {
					this.value++;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the game loop
		function loop() {
			ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
			bird.draw();
			bird.update();
			pipes.draw();
			pipes.update();
			score.draw();
			score.update();
			if (bird.y + bird.height > canvas.height || bird.y < 0) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			if (bird.x + bird.width > pipes.top.x && bird.x < pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width && bird.y < pipes.top.height || bird.x + bird.width > pipes.bottom.x && bird.x < pipes.bottom.x + pipes.bottom.width && bird.y + bird.height > pipes.bottom.y) {
				alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
				location.reload();
			}
			requestAnimationFrame(loop);
		}

		// Set up the event listeners
		document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
			if (event.keyCode === 32) {
				bird.flap();
			}
		});

		// Start the game loop
		loop();
	</script>
</body>
</html>
make pressing escape pause the game

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<title>Flappy Bird Game</title>
	<style>
		canvas {
			position: absolute;
			top: 0;
			left: 0;
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
			z-index: -1;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas id="canvas"></canvas>
	<script>
		// Get the canvas element and context
		var canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
		var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

		// Set the canvas dimensions to match the window size
		canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
		canvas.height = window.innerHeight;

		// Set up the bird object
		var bird = {
			x: 50,
			y: canvas.height / 2,
			width: 50,
			height: 50,
			speed: 5,
			gravity: 0.5,
			jump: 10,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "yellow";
				ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
			},
			update: function() {
				this.speed += this.gravity;
				this.y += this.speed;
			},
			flap: function() {
				this.speed = -this.jump;
			}
		};

		// Set up the pipes object
		var pipes = {
			top: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: 0,
				width: 50,
				height: canvas.height / 2 - 100,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			bottom: {
				x: canvas.width,
				y: canvas.height / 2 + 100,
				width: 50,
				height: canvas.height / 2 - 100,
				speed: 5,
				draw: function() {
					ctx.fillStyle = "green";
					ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
				},
				update: function() {
					this.x -= this.speed;
				}
			},
			draw: function() {
				this.top.draw();
				this.bottom.draw();
			},
			update: function() {
				this.top.update();
				this.bottom.update();
				if (this.top.x + this.top.width < 0) {
					this.top.x = canvas.width;
					this.bottom.x = canvas.width;
					this.top.height = Math.floor(Math.random() * (canvas.height / 2 - 200)) + 50;
					this.bottom.y = this.top.height + 200;
					this.bottom.height = canvas.height - this.bottom.y;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the score object
		var score = {
			value: 0,
			draw: function() {
				ctx.fillStyle = "black";
				ctx.font = "30px Arial";
				ctx.fillText("Score: " + this.value, 10, 50);
			},
			update: function() {
				if (pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width < bird.x) {
					this.value++;
				}
			}
		};

		// Set up the game loop
		var paused = false;
		function loop() {
			if (!paused) {
				ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
				bird.draw();
				bird.update();
				pipes.draw();
				pipes.update();
				score.draw();
				score.update();
				if (bird.y + bird.height > canvas.height || bird.y < 0) {
					alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
					location.reload();
				}
				if (bird.x + bird.width > pipes.top.x && bird.x < pipes.top.x + pipes.top.width && bird.y < pipes.top.height || bird.x + bird.width > pipes.bottom.x && bird.x < pipes.bottom.x + pipes.bottom.width && bird.y + bird.height > pipes.bottom.y) {
					alert("Game Over! Your score is " + score.value);
					location.reload();
				}
				requestAnimationFrame(loop);
			}
		}

		// Set up the event listeners
		document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
			if (event.keyCode === 32) {
				bird.flap();
			} else if (event.keyCode === 27) {
				paused = !paused;
				if (!paused) {
					loop();
				}
			}
		});

		// Start the game loop
		loop();
	</script>
</body>
</html>
